snippet.title: Monster Loves You Too!  - Announce Trailer - August 2022
snippet.description: You are born in the city of Asch and find food, forge friendships, and fend off bigger monsters, all while resisting your own monstrous urges to cheat, steal, kill, and lie at every turn. MLY2 is scheduled for a December 2022 release. Read more: www.MonsterLovesYou.com
